title: Deploy shards from HDFS into local cores
description: This issue extends CoreAdminHandler to allow installation of new cores from HDFS.

comments.author: Jason Rutherglen
comments.content: There's a DFSCoreAdminHandler that enables a new dfsdeploy action that copies a path out of HDFS onto the local system.  The test case shows this working.
